Interface MovieRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Movie,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Movie,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Movie,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Movie,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Movie,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Movie>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Movie,Long>
@Repository public interface MovieRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Movie,Long>
Repository interface for managing Movie entities. Extends JpaRepository to provide CRUD operations and pagination capabilities for Movie objects. Provides methods to find movies by their active status and by exact title.

  • Method Details

    • findByIsActive

      List<Movie> findByIsActive(boolean isActive)
      Finds all movies with the specified active status.
      Parameters:
      isActive - whether the movie is active (true) or inactive (false)
      Returns:
      list of movies matching the active status

    • findByTitle

      List<Movie> findByTitle(String title)
      Finds all movies with the exact specified title.
      Parameters:
      title - the exact title of the movie to search for
      Returns:
      list of movies with the matching title
